description.uitpas: You are responsible for building the integration yourself, with support from our documentation.
description.entry-api: You are responsible for building the integration yourself, with support from our documentation.

description.search-api: You handle the setup yourself while gaining access to all the functionalities of the Search API.
description.widgets: You handle the setup yourself while gaining access to all the functionalities of the Widgets.
After an intake interview, publiq takes care of the configuration of your widget.

description.search-api: We will contact you for a tailored solution that meets your use case and target audience.
description.widgets: We will contact you for a tailored solution that meets your use case and target audience.

hero.title: Reach a broader audience with UiT
hero.intro: publiq offers a range of solutions to promote your own activities and integrate agenda information into your website or app.

uitpas_api.title: UiTPAS API
uitpas_api.description: Register discounts, trade rewards and save points for UiTPAS passholders

entry_api.title: Entry API
entry_api.description: Via Entry API, you can create, modify, and delete items in the UiTdatabank.
features: Activation on live environment upon request

search_api.title: Search API
search_api.description: Retrieve event information from the UiTdatabank via our latest search engine.

widgets.title: Widgets
widgets.description: Ready-made HTML modules that you can integrate into your website.

integration_form.title: Add integration

pricing_plan.label: Pricing plan
pricing_plan.info: You only pay when you want to use real data. You can explore all possibilities with test events first.

integration_form.description_name: Give a clear title to your integration and mention the name of the organization or municipality for which the integration is built.

aim.label: Integration purpose
aim.info: Provide a clear, motivated description of the integration you want to set up with the publiq platform (max. 200 characters).

website.label: Website
website.info: De URL van de website of app waarvoor de integratie gebouwd wordt.

contact_functional.label: Functional contact
contact_functional.info: The functional contact is the functional point of contact for the integration (e.g., an employee of the organization or municipality for which the integration is intended).

contact_technical.label: Technical contact
contact_technical.info: The technical contact is the technical point of contact for the integration (e.g., the developer of the integration).

integration_form.error: Not all mandatory fields were filled in correctly. Check your input.
integration_form.agree: I agree to the <1>terms of use</1> and the <2>privacy policy</2>

uitpasAgreement.label: I agree with the <1>processing conditions of UiTPAS<1>

integrations.title: My integrations
integrations.pending_credentials: API credentials incoming! Just clearing the runway for a smooth landing.

status.pending_approval_integration_description: Approval from publiq is necessary for the live integration. All information to smoothly go live can be found <0>here</0>.
status.pending_approval_payment_description: Ready to work with real data and events? Activate your Search API integration (from â‚¬125 per year)

activation_dialog.title: Request activation
activation_dialog.contact_description: This address will receive payment instructions, reminders and the invoice.

organizers.title: UiTdatabank organizers
organizers.info: Enter the UiTdatabank organizers for which you want to execute actions in UiTPAS.
organizers.label: Organizers

delete_dialog.title: Delete contact
delete_dialog.question: Are you sure you want to delete the contact with email address {{email}}?

alert.title: Danger zone
alert.description: Contacts can edit, activate, and delete the integration. Once deleted, a contact no longer has access to the integration.

organizers_info.title: Organizers
organizers_info.description: Below you see an overview of the UiTdatabank organizers for which you can execute actions in the UiTPAS API.

billing_info.name: Name of company, organization or municipality
billing_info.free_until_live: This integration is currently running on a test environment. You only pay when your integration is active in the live environment
billing_info.coupon_used: A coupon of {{price}} has been applied

credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.status_alert: Approval from publiq is necessary for the live integration of this project. All information to smoothly go live can be found
credentials.in_progress: Your activation request is being processed.
credentials.uitid_alert: You can switch to authentication with client credentials. Check <0>here</0> whether this method of authentication is suitable for your application. Once you have requested client credentials, your API key remains valid for another 6 months.
credentials.info: These credentials remain valid for another {{amount}} and will be permanently deleted on {{date}}

integration_settings.title: Settings

delete.title: Delete URL
delete.question: Do you really want to delete this URL?

leave.title: Leave tab?
leave.question: Changes that you made may not be saved.

integration_settings.error: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het indienen van het formulier. Controleer uw invoer en probeer het opnieuw.

delete.title: Danger zone
delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete this integration?
delete.description: When you delete your integration, access to the APIs will be immediately terminated. After deleting your integration, you will receive a final year's invoice from us. Deleting an integration cannot be undone.

support.title: Support
support.description: We support you in various ways so you can easily set up an integration with the publiq ecosystem.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: With our extensive documentation, we guide you through every integration.

styleguide.title: Style guide
styleguide.description: All icons, logos, and colours compiled for you. A must when building a UiT agenda (Dutch only).

statuspage.title: Status page
statuspage.description: We provide an overview of the status of applications & services within the publiq platform. You can subscribe to stay informed of important updates (Dutch only).

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: Take a look at our plans and share your brilliant ideas to make our products even better (Dutch only).

release_notes.title: Release notes
release_notes.description: An overview of all new features, technical changes, and improvements within the publiq platform.

support_via_slack.title: Support via Slack
support_via_slack.description: Have questions after reading our documentation? We're here to help. Reach us quickly through our support channel on Slack.

customized_support.title: Customised support
customized_support.description: An organization with a passion for culture and leisure? We'd love to tailor a proposal for you!

dialog.invite_error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

newsletter.title: Stay informed
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter (Dutch) and stay up to date with the latest publiq news.

success.title: Welcome!
success.description: We have sent you a welcome email.

500.title: Oops! Something went Wrong.
500.description: We're sorry, but there seems to be a problem on our end. Our team has been notified, and we're working to fix this as quickly as possible. Please try refreshing the page in a few minutes. If the problem persists, feel free to contact us at <0>technical-support@publiq.be</0> for assistance. We appreciate your understanding and patience.

404.title: Sorry, this page does not exist (anymore).
404.description: You clicked on a link to a page that we unfortunately cannot find on publiq platform.
